revised_title: Investigating the Specificity of Antigonadotropic Sera
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to understand the specificity of antigonadotropic sera, which are substances that neutralize the effects of gonadotropic hormones. They found that each antiserum was effective in neutralizing the effects of the specific gonadotropic extract it was prepared against. The study also showed that there is a high degree of species and source specificity in antigonadotropic sera, meaning that they are more effective against hormones from the same species and source they were derived from.
